import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import UserContext from '../context/user/UserContext' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const SignupScreen = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [userDetails, setUserDetails] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', }) // for user context const uContext = useContext(UserContext) const { signup, user } = uContext useEffect(() => { if (user) navigate('/') // eslint-disable-next-line }, []) const handleChange = e => { setUserDetails({ ...userDetails, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSignup = e => { e.preventDefault() signup(userDetails.name, userDetails.email, userDetails.password) } return (
{/* Signup */ }
